name: Dog Walk (AngelOnIt)
description:
Keyboard/Mouse Controls:

  • WASD: Move Dog
  • Mouse: Move Camera
  • Left Click: Jump
  • Right Click: Hold to Run
  • Mouse Wheel Click: Center Camera
  • Esc: Quit
  • R: Restart

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Stick: Move Dog
  • Right Stick: Move Camera
  • A (or X ): Jump
  • B/X (or Square/Circle ): Hold to Run
  • Left Trigger: Center Camera
  • Start/Options: Quit
  • Back/Share: Restart
